title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 574.1 - General rule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 574.1 - General rule

State Regulations

Class A and class B regional projects subject to agency
review shall be reviewed according to the standards set forth in section 809 of
the Adirondack Park Agency Act and this Part. Projects which are also rivers
projects or wetlands projects shall be subject, as applicable, to the
additional standards in Parts 577 and 578 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
574.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
